title: CAN'T TRANSFER MY THUNDERBIRD FROM PC TO  PHONE.  I KEEP SCANNING CODE AND WON'T TAKE PIC.
creator: tulsa2145
content: I just got thunderbird and I'm so grateful to the ones who have immediately answered my questions. Now I'm trying to transfer my email of thunderbird from my pc to my cell phone. I keep trying to take picture of the QR code and it won't take it. I tried with my regular camera and it took it fine. Can you help me? Thank you for your time and knowledge.
